mapper.select: SELECT APPROVAL_NO as approvalNo, USER_NO as userNo, APPROVAL_TYPE as approvalType, APPROVAL_STATUS as approvalStatus, APPROVAL_TITLE as approvalTitle, APPROVAL_CONTENT as approvalContent, START_DATE as startDate, END_DATE as endDate, APPROVAL_USER as approvalUser, CREATED_AT as createdAt FROM APPROVAL ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
